1.card_detail: WebdriverIO is fully open source and can be found on GitHub

2.card_detail: WebdriverIO has a great community that supports all members.

3.card_detail: The JS Foundation is host to projects that span the entire JavaScript ecosystem.

4.card_detail: The community around WebdriverIO is actively speaking on various user groups or conferences about specific topics around automated testing with WebdriverIO.

5.card_detail: Adding helper functions, or more complicated sets and combinations of existing commands is simple and really useful

6.card_detail: WebdriverIO works in combination with most of the TDD and BDD test frameworks in the JavaScript world
